name: ClimateCamp
summary: ClimateCamp is the most collaborative sustainability platform, connecting customer and supplier organizations on real emissions data, targets and reductions initiatives. ClimateCamp guides organizations in uncovering the hidden 85% of their greenhouse gas emissions (GHG), helping meet SBTI and CSRD requirements, easily manage the Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions and get visibility of the value chain emissions.
